H0.text: who was the winner of the first indianapolis 500. Louis Chevrolet

H1.text: who was the winner of the first indianapolis 500. Ralph DePalma

H2.text: who was the winner of the first indianapolis 500. Barney Oldfield

H3.text: who was the winner of the first indianapolis 500. Ray Harroun

A4.text: He is most famous for winning the inaugural Indianapolis 500 in 1911.

A5.text: Harroun went on to win at an average speed of 74.602 miles per hour (120.060 km/h).
